body.name: ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone for Phone PC PS5,RGB Mic with Quick Mute,RGB Indicator,Tripod Stand,Pop Filter,Shock Mount,Gain Control,No-Lentancy Monitor for Streaming Discord Twitch Podcasts Videos
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 6 mins
features: 【Dynamic Multi-Color Gradients】Amplify your gaming and live streaming immersion with a dynamic RGB lighting feature in the microphone that seamlessly shifts, crafting a captivating pulsating ambiance. This RGB microphone for podcast flaunts seven rainbow-inspired colors that seamlessly transition through automatic gradient color modes when the microphone is active. Mute (short click) for a classy red glow; long press the mute button to TURN OFF the lights.

【Easy Plug&Play Setup】This USB gaming microphone for computer is ready to use with Computer, Laptop, PC, Windows, Mac OS, PS4, and PS5 right out of the box. Connect it easily to your iPhone, Type C Phone, iPad, or Android Tablet using the included USB IPHONE ADAPTER and Type C to USB adapter. No additional setup steps are required with this plug-and-play solution. Start creating video content and engage with platforms like YouTube, Instagram, Zoom, TikTok, Twitch, and podcasting effortlessly.

【Premium Sound Quality】This 96kHz RGB USB microphone for iPhone captures every nuance of your voice, ensuring superior sound quality. Its Cardioid pickup pattern adeptly eliminates background noise. The addition of a shock mount and detachable pop filter enhances your recording sessions, elevating them to sonic excellence. The collapsible mic tripod stand is now extended and enlarged, offering increased stability on your gaming desk, minimizing vibrations for an enhanced recording experience.

【Convenient Mic Gain Knob】This USB podcast microphone features a gain knob for adjusting volume and sensitivity during recording. Lower the gain to minimize room noise, or turn it counter-clockwise for increased sensitivity and a better sound. The microphone features a gear-designed volume knob positioned at the bottom, ensuring not only improved convenience but also a more tactile user experience. In addition, This monitor microphone features a 3.5mm headphone jack for real-time monitoring.

【Quick Mute Functionality】Press the microphone's mute button for instant muting and press it again to unmute. When muted, the RGB lights turn red, serving as a visual reminder. Ideal for gaming, live streaming, vocal recording, ASMR, broadcasting, podcasting and professional meetings. This USB microphone offers versatility in its functionality.

【What You Get】1 x Sturdy RGB streaming microphone; 1 x Collapsible Tripod Microphone Stand; 1 x Anti-vibration shock mount with elastic rubber bands; 1 x 78.7 Inch USB Audio Cable; 1 x USB Adapter for iPhone and iPad; 1 x Type C Adapter for the Newest MacBook and all other Type C devices (Phone, tablets and PC); 1 x Detachable Microphone Pop Shield Screen; 1 x User manual and free Technical Support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BKD-11: Tailored for Your Podcasting and Audio Game Tailored to the needs of gamers, streamers, content creators, and audio enthusiasts, this 96kHz microphone excels at capturing precise, clear high-frequency audio—making it ideal for professional recording tasks.

Unleash Your Creativity with our Pro-Grade 96kHz Professional Microphone Instant Mute with Quick Click Intuitive Controls: Mute Mic with a Short Click, RGB Turns Red; Long Press to Toggle Off RGB. No-Latency Monitor Immersive Voice Recording: Experience No-Latency Monitoring and Personalized Atmosphere with Gear-Designed Volume Control. No fixed Angle Restrictions Flexible and Sturdy Mic: 360-Degree Rotation with Weighted, Extended, and Enlarged Collapsible Tripod Stand for Optimal Audio Output. Detachable Pop Filter Precision Sound Capture: The detachable pop filter effectively blocks wind, air blasts, and plosive noise, reducing popping and hissing in recordings.
Strong Compatibility with PC, Computer, Laptop, iPhone, Smartphone, iPad, PS 4&5. (TYPE-C ADAPTER & USB ADAPTER FOR IPHONE INCLUDE)
Enjoy dynamic and radiant RGB lighting effects with this microphone It boasts dynamic RGB multi-color gradient effects. Simply long-press the button to deactivate the RGB effect when it's not needed.

A microphone for all of your needs It excels in a wide range of applications, including recording, live streaming, gaming, and much more. Furthermore, it presents an excellent choice for gifting to your friends! Bring it home, and it will undoubtedly deliver a multitude of delightful surprises!

How can I disable the RGB lighting on the microphone? To turn off the RGB lights, just give the mute button a long press. How is the RGB light showcased? This RGB microphone flaunts seven rainbow-inspired colors that seamlessly transition through automatic gradient color modes when the microphone is active. How can I ensure that the microphone is muted? A brief press of the mute button will indicate that the microphone is muted. You'll notice the RGB lighting transitioning to a solid red color. Which adapter is included with it? It comes with a Type-C adapter compatible with Android devices and a USB adapter for compatibility with iPhones from 5 onwards and iPads from 4 onwards. Is it compatible with my iPhone 14 Pro? Certainly, it is compatible with your iPhone 15, and rest assured that the microphone comes with a USB adapter for iPhone and iPad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for new streamers and podcasters seeking a versatile, eye-catching mic.
reviews.reviewText: Upon unboxing the ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone, the packaging presented itself with a balance of simplicity and eye-catching design, showcasing the RGB features effectively. It didn't exude an overtly premium feel but did not come across as cheap either, striking a satisfactory middle ground.The microphone itself boasts several key features. The dynamic multi-color gradients with seven colors provide a visually appealing experience, particularly impressive when active. The mute function, with its red light indicator, is intuitive and practical during live sessions. Its plug-and-play setup across multiple platforms and devices, including PS5 and various operating systems, simplifies the installation process, appealing to non-tech-savvy users.Sound quality is where the ZealSound microphone seems to shine. The 96kHz recording capability and cardioid pickup pattern focus on voice while minimizing background noise. The inclusion of a shock mount and pop filter is a thoughtful addition, aiming to enhance recording clarity. The gain knob for volume and sensitivity adjustment is well-placed and offers tactile feedback, which I found to be user-friendly.During testing, the microphone performed well. The sound captured was clear, and the cardioid pattern effectively isolated my voice from ambient noise. The no-latency monitoring is a standout feature, essential for real-time content creators.When comparing to other microphones in the same category, the ZealSound offers a competitive edge with its RGB feature, broad compatibility, and audio quality, standing out for aspiring streamers and gamers looking for an all-in-one solution.Considering the price point, the microphone does seem to offer good value for money, especially with the added accessories and ease of use.Positives include the rich sound quality, user-friendly design, and versatile compatibility. As for downsides, while the build quality is adequate, it may not satisfy those looking for a more robust or heavy-duty feel.In summary, I would recommend the ZealSound Gaming USB Microphone to content creators, gamers, and podcasters who seek a balance of functionality, aesthetic appeal, and affordability. It's particularly suited to those entering the streaming or podcasting arena who require a reliable, versatile, and visually engaging microphone setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent budget friendly mic, looks awesome
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent bare bones mic that looks awesome.The audience for this type of mic is most likely going to be the live streamers, remote workers, and content creators. While I think that it functionally serves that need pretty well, this is also missing some features that the more expensive sets up have. For example, some of the other mic brands offer compression and eq settings with their custom software. That essentially means that one could get a radio type vocal sound even if your voice isn't as impressive in real life. Thankfully, there are ways, either by post-processioning an audio recording or changing settings in your stream software, some of this can be adjusted. Unfortunately, sometimes knowing what to change is really difficult without being familiar with audio processing techniques.It definitely looks pretty awesome when plugged in.I'll give my synopsis and then the pros/cons list. I think that streamers and content creators who are just getting started would benefit greatly from this microphone without having to spend a lot of money before they know what they want out of a microphone. This would also benefit anyone in audio creation that has the ability to perform post-processing in order to enhance their sound on pre-recorded audio clips. People could struggle with this mic if they have no idea how to set up audio to sound decent. However, even then, this mic could still be completely worth it just to capture thoughts or produce anything.This would probably not be my first mic choice, but it definitely wouldn't be my last choice either value for money it is great, but for higher end streamers, this might not be sufficient for your needs.Pros:- Comes with iOS adapter and USB-C adapter- Beautiful design that looks awesome especially if you are into streaming- Audio quality so far seems to be good- Volume control if audio is mic signal too loud- Plug and play, it worked instantly without any configuration or hassle.- Supports "headphone monitoring", this means that you can send your audio signal to your headphones if needed.- Mute easily accessible on front of mic- Comes with stand which makes it perfect for a desktop set up- This can be used "offline", i.e. not connected to a computer. By using a USB power adapter to supply the power, and the headphone jack as the audio output.Cons- Some other mics offer some preset settings to enhance your voice, this is a much simpler mic that may require additional processing for things like compression and EQ- Appears that there's no way to have the color remain static. It is either on with always changing colors, or off.- Additional outputs would be nice, like XLR, but this is definitely geared toward the streamers and being budget friendly- Battery powered would have been great, but you can use a USB battery pack if needed toNitpicks- Volume control is on the bottom which could be inconvenient or cause you to fumble for controlling it
